data.title: Smiling Amazon boxes are singing again in new holiday ad — will high shipping costs dull the mood?
data.text: For the third year in a row, the Amazon boxes are singing to ring in the holiday shopping season.

data.title: Amazon is responsible for most Big Tech job growth since 2000
data.text: Five of the largest tech firms in the U.S., Facebook, Alphabet, Microsoft, Apple and Amazon, have put more than 1 million people to work between 2000 and 2018.

data.title: Where, Why, and When AMZN Stock Can Be Bought
data.text: A big-time rally is in the works in AMZN stock.

data.title: With a Laser, Researchers Say They Can Hack Alexa, Google Home or Siri
data.text: Researchers in Japan and at the University of Michigan said they have found a way to take over the voice-controlled digital assistants.

data.title: RBC's Mark Mahaney on the biggest wins in Q3 earnings
data.text: Mark Mahaney of RBC and Youssef Squali of SunTrust join "Squawk Alley" to discuss the markets and some of the biggest winners of earnings season.

data.title: 6 Stocks That Can Win the Pay TV Streaming Wars
data.text: Video streaming services are proliferating rapidly, with a growing number of deep pocketed players getting into the game. A shakeout is inevitable.
